get.description: Gets the site, and your user data.

post.description:
Generate a TOTP / two-factor secret.
Afterwards you need to call `/user/totp/update` with a valid token to enable it.

get.description:
Export a backup of your user settings, including your saved content,
followed communities, and blocks.

post.description: Import a backup of your user settings.

get.description: List login tokens for your user
Returns an error message if your auth token is invalid
List all the media for your user
List all the media known to your instance.

post.description:
Enable / Disable TOTP / two-factor authentication.
To enable, you need to first call `/user/totp/generate` and then pass a valid token to this.
Disabling is only possible if 2FA was previously enabled. Again it is necessary to pass a valid token.

put.description: Hide a community from public / "All" view. Admins only.

Add a moderator to your community.
A moderator remove for a post.
Hide a post from list views.
A moderator can lock a post ( IE disable new comments ).
A moderator can feature a community post ( IE stick it to the top of a community ).
